title: Repainter, the Material You theme customizer, is now out of beta
content:
Material You dynamic theming was one of the highlight features of Android 12, as it could change the colors used in applications and across the system based on your current wallpaper. However, it’s not super customizable, which is where the Repainter application comes in. After a short time in beta, the first stable release of

The post Repainter, the Material You theme customizer, is now out of beta appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Repainter, the app that allows you to customize the Material You theme engine in Android 12, is now out of beta.
